titles.title: To authorize the vessel R/V ROSS SEAL to be documented under the laws of a foreign country during a 3-year period.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.
Mr. Brooks asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries discharged.
An objection was heard to the unanimous consent request to consider the measure.

bill.summary: 10/6/1994--Introduced. Authorizes a named vessel to be documented under the laws of a foreign country, without prohibition from or ineligiblity for engagement in coastwise trade.
